text: Ingemar Harald Robert Hedberg (8 March 1920 - 19 May 2019) was a Swedish sprint canoeist. He competed in the early 1950s. He won the silver medal in the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki. Hedberg also won three gold medals at the 1950 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Copenhagen. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1920 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Sweden Category:Canoeists Category:People from Ã–rebro
title: Ingemar Hedberg
